ygData.subject: Im getting werry litle XP
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi I am totaly with you Karim, when i started as a wizard i was told they where masters of damage and travel. Now i am lv 18 and getting near my first travel
ygData.messageBody:
Hi


I am totaly with you Karim, when i started as a wizard i was told they where masters of damage and travel. Now i am lv 18 and getting near my first travel spells so i look them over and what do i see ? MOST of them go to bad zones for most wizards and the nearby ones !!. Why 2 travel spells to Karan for taking an example ? this is not what i was expecting. If i hade info on this before i hade playd a Druid maybe. One of the reasons i chose wizard was of the travel spells, and sure we get spells to outher planes. But do they work yet ? atleast one aint working maybe more. And that with resisiting spells well some resist and that often happens when the monster is way to high for you.

Do anyone know how much XP penalty Wizards get ? even Paladins who are an hybrid class and get XP penalty get more XP then me.


I play on Veeshan and if anyone see me on and want to group give me a tell. I am in High Hold Pass at the moment



Askur Gnome Wizard on Veeshan
